Method.name: CopyFrom
Method.Description: Copies properties (with the same name) from another object into this one. The other object doesn't have to have the same class; properties are matched by name.
Method.Implementation:
Do %code.WriteLine(" Set Cls = Other.%ClassName(1)") Set key = "" For { #dim PropDef As %Dictionary.PropertyDefinition Set PropDef = %class.Properties.GetNext(.key) If key = "" Quit
If PropDef.Private Continue
Set Name = PropDef.Name If $Extract(Name) = "%" Continue
Do %code.WriteLine(" If $$$comMemberDefined(Cls,""a"","""_Name_""") Set .."_Name_" = Other."_Name) }
Quit $$$OK
